includedAssets.title: Out Of Town
includedAssets.synopsis: As season three begins, Sal accompanies Don on a business trip to Baltimore, where both men succumb to the powers of persuasive seduction.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As season three begins, Sal accompanies Don on a business trip to Baltimore, where both men succumb to the powers of persuasive seduction.

includedAssets.title: Love Among The Ruins
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - Love Among The Ruins
includedAssets.synopsis: The Drapers dine with stuffy new British boss Lane Pryce (Jared Harris), while Peggy's personal involvement in a campaign leaves her greatly affected.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Drapers dine with stuffy new British boss Lane Pryce (Jared Harris), while Peggy's personal involvement in a campaign leaves her greatly affected.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Drapers dine with stuffy new British boss Lane Pryce (Jared Harris), while Peggy's personal involvement in a campaign leaves her greatly affected.

includedAssets.title: My Old Kentucky Home
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - My Old Kentucky Home
includedAssets.synopsis: A mandatory overtime session leaves the writers trying to stave off late-night boredom. Meanwhile, Sally has a run-in with Grandpa.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A mandatory overtime session leaves the writers trying to stave off late-night boredom. Meanwhile, Sally has a run-in with Grandpa.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A mandatory overtime session leaves the writers trying to stave off late-night boredom. Meanwhile, Sally has a run-in with Grandpa.

includedAssets.title: The Arrangements
includedAssets.synopsis: The agency welcomes an excited new client with money to throw around, while Don crosses paths with his father-in-law.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The agency welcomes an excited new client with money to throw around, while Don crosses paths with his father-in-law.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The agency welcomes an excited new client with money to throw around, while Don crosses paths with his father-in-law.

includedAssets.title: The Fog
includedAssets.synopsis: Sally's behaviour causes concern for Don and Betty, while opportunistic Pete tries to work a new angle into his business dealings.

includedAssets.title: Guy Walks Into An Advertising Agency
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep6 - Guy Walks Into An Advertising Agency
includedAssets.synopsis: The team are taken by surprise when a visitor arrives at Sterling Cooper. Meanwhile, Joan is the recipient of some unexpected news.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team are taken by surprise when a visitor arrives at Sterling Cooper. Meanwhile, Joan is the recipient of some unexpected news.

includedAssets.title: Seven Twenty Three
includedAssets.synopsis: Betty becomes involved in local politics, while a troubling incident leads Don to think about his future.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Betty becomes involved in local politics, while a troubling incident leads Don to think about his future.

includedAssets.title: Souvenir
includedAssets.synopsis: Betty accompanies Don on a business trip to Rome to see Conrad Hilton, while Pete experiments with bachelorhood when Trudy is out of town.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Betty accompanies Don on a business trip to Rome to see Conrad Hilton, while Pete experiments with bachelorhood when Trudy is out of town.

includedAssets.title: Wee Small Hours
includedAssets.synopsis: Sal's career is on the line when he fails to give a client what they want. Betty holds a fundraising event and Don grows closer to Suzanne.

includedAssets.title: The Colour Blue
includedAssets.synopsis: Sterling Cooper celebrates a company milestone. Peggy competes with Paul for an account and Betty makes a shocking discovery.

includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep11 - The Gypsy and the Hobo
includedAssets.synopsis: Don is forced to make a confession when Betty confronts him about his past. Joan and Greg make plans for their future.

includedAssets.synopsis: Peggy's taste in men proves questionable and Pete faces a major decision about his career. A major national tragedy rocks the staff.

includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep13 - Shut The Door. Have A Seat
includedAssets.synopsis: Season three concludes as Don has a pivotal meeting with Conrad Hilton. Meanwhile, Don, Roger, Bertram & Lane are forced to take drastic action.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: There are tumultuous times ahead for the Sterling Cooper team in this third season as past sins come home to roost at a time of great political upheaval. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.

includedIn.title: Mad Men
includedIn.synopsis: The ambitious Peggy Olson joins the stylish world of 1960s New York advertising as the new secretary of mysterious executive Don Draper at prestigious ad agency Sterling Cooper.
